Here’s a summary of few projects: 
 
•	Collaborating with analytics lead to build inventory control towers– a system that provides status of finished goods at various stages of the supply chain, compares statuses with planned inventory and builds 5 successive random forests using R randomForest package to highlight stages where finished goods are less than planned inventory.  
o	Return on Investment (ROI): The project provides a great tool to recognize problem areas and it will be used by management and factory managers on a daily basis. 
 
•	Managed a project that involved building a supply chain network to reduce Carbon Dioxide footprint. The team had 2 analysts and it involved building the transportation network using SQL server management studio, cleaning the network using Python Digraph library and then optimizing network using IBM ILOG CPLEX studio.  
The final network analyzed 4 key products and consisted of ~1 million decision variable, >3 million constraints and it was an integer linear programming problem.  
o	ROI: >1 million USD.

Constructed market basket/association rules using R arules package to understand which consumer characteristics’ trigger a purchase

•	Built a Neural Network and a Logistic Regression model for Chandler factory to predict product yield during the end stages of manufacturing. The goal was to facilitate better capacity planning and material utilization. R caret package was used to build models and Tableau was used to present the data.

Summary Senior Industrial Engineer with 16 years of unique experience in innovative capacity planning, operations management, complex facility layout, lean manufacturing and engineering management who has spanned multiple industries including semiconductors , aerospace, and industrial equipment manufacturing. As a change agent and an efficiency expert, I provide expertise for lean transformations, capital equipment productivity, process improvements and variability reduction.  
 
Skills: 
+Classically trained Industrial engineer who uses proven Industrial & Operations Engineering methodologies. 
+Architect of high volume/high mix manufacturing systems with tightly integrated high speed automated handling. 
+Thought leader in the reduction of cycle time (and by extension reduction in variablity). 
+Strategic planning champion with capabilities that include long range demand assessment, capacity translation, and future project/layout planning. 
+Lean/Six Sigma enthusiast who started on factory floor and works consistently with intel industry experts (Trane & Boeing in past). 
+Respected Self-motivated Leader with both formal training and experience working in traditional & matrix organizations.  
 
Specialties: 
+Capacity Systemization Specialist with strong background in development and continuous improvement.  
+Experience with large facility high volume conversion to leading edge technology and greenfield layout development.  
+"Red tape" minimizer who uses Theory of Constraints, Lean, Six Sigma and production experience to create laser focus on real problems, solve them and repeat.  
+Team leader that understands human nature and how to mold people into a high performing team to meet company objectives. 
+Hobby Industrial Engineer recruiter with excellent contacts and track record in finding, luring and hiring talented IE professionals.
